thread.title: Former Kotoko boy Gideon Baah makes Black Stars debut in Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Former Kotoko boy Gideon Baah makes Black Stars debut in Canada friendly

title: Former Kotoko boy Gideon Baah makes Black Stars debut in Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 06:55 CET Former Kotoko boy Gideon Baah makes Black Stars debut in Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Gideon Baah finally made his Ghana debut on Tuesday 
Former Asante Kotoko defender Gideon Baah finally got his chance to impress Ghana coach Avram Grant after coming off the bench to play in the Black Stars’ 1-1 draw with Canada in Tuesday international friendly. 
The 24-year-old lateral defender stepped out of the dug-out on the hour-mark to take the place of Getafe’s Bernard Mensah and he gave a good account of himself. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
